title: ProxyEmy
description: Local reverse proxy help you in Web development don't bother you have frontend project or lot backend microservices. You can easy bypass CORS issues and setup external microservices as it will be runned on local host. All application configuration can be stored in one YAML file and shared with teammates and friends.

screenshoots.title: Server information page contains all server configuration
Request Log page contains information about all performed requests

features.title: Resolve CORS issues
features.description: All you project (frontends or/and backends) will be on the same host, which will solve all cross-domain problems

features.title: HTTPS on local machine
features.description: Test web applications/services that require a secure connection on a local machine like PWA, Android emulator etc

features.title: Demystification HTTPS traffic
features.description: Any external web service can be mapped to local http (not secure) endpoint. Any sniffers can be see all traffic without encryption

features.title: All (micro)services in one place
features.description: All you (micro)services can be placed on one host inside human-readable aliases like http://localhost/authservice

features.title: Configuration in YAML
features.description: All settings of application can be stored in one YAML file and sharing with teammates via Git, DropBox etc

features.title: Clean and simple UI
features.description: The main goal is to simplify the functionality of the application as much as possible.

newfeatures: Added new option verifyCertificates for enabling strong check SSL certificates
